scripts.build:css: sass --load-path=node_modules --load-path=$(bundle info --path activeadmin)/app/assets/stylesheets ./app/assets/stylesheets/application.sass.scss ./app/assets/builds/application.css --no-source-map && sass --load-path=node_modules --load-path=$(bundle info --path activeadmin)/app/assets/stylesheets ./app/assets/stylesheets/active_admin.sass.scss ./app/assets/builds/active_admin.css --no-source-map
